definition: a law officer having duties similar to those of a sheriff in carrying out the judgments of a court of law, make ready for action or use
details:
noun
- a law officer having duties similar to those of a sheriff in carrying out the judgments of a court of law
= synonyms: marshall
- (in some countries) a military officer of highest rank
= synonyms: marshall
verb
- make ready for action or use
= example: make ready for action or use
= synonyms: mobilize, mobilise, summon
- arrange in logical order
= example: arrange in logical order
- place in proper rank
= example: place in proper rank
- lead ceremoniously, as in a procession
